segment_text: The stranger sat down at the other end of Robinson's bench, closer than strictly necessary.
scene_description: outdoors, nighttime, deserted street, falling snow, streetlight

segment_text: He wore a Navy blue pea coat and billed cap with earmuffs against the bitter cold.
scene_description: outdoors, nighttime, deserted street, falling snow, streetlight

segment_text: His complexion was ravaged, his eyes bloodshot, and Robinson knew the man meant to kill him.
scene_description: outdoors, nighttime, deserted street, falling snow, streetlight

segment_text: It was long past dark on Christmas Eve of the worst year of Robinson's life.
scene_description: outdoors, nighttime, deserted street, falling snow, streetlight

segment_text: There was nowhere else for him to go.
scene_description: outdoors, nighttime, deserted street, falling snow, streetlight

segment_text: As he pulled the collar of his thrift store coat higher around his neck, he felt something sting his cheek and looked up.
scene_description: outdoors, nighttime, deserted street, falling snow, streetlight

segment_text: Specks of white flashed in the glare of the streetlight behind him.
scene_description: outdoors, nighttime, deserted street, falling snow, streetlight

segment_text: Snow, Robinson thought. Perfect.
scene_description: outdoors, nighttime, deserted street, falling snow, streetlight

segment_text: His fall from grace had been quick, if not painless; absurd, if not actually funny.
scene_description: outdoors, nighttime, deserted street, falling snow, streetlight

segment_text: He'd come home from the meeting where he'd learned that the company had gone belly up to find his apartment building in flames.
scene_description: outdoors, nighttime, deserted street, falling snow, streetlight

segment_text: The application for his renter's insurance was in his briefcase, ready to mail.
scene_description: outdoors, nighttime, deserted street, falling snow, streetlight

segment_text: His former CEO was headed for a minimum-security, tennis camp prison for having plundered the employees' benefits, including their health insurance premiums, and blown it all on the stock market.
scene_description: outdoors, nighttime, deserted street, falling snow, streetlight

segment_text: He'd maxed out his credit card on the move to North Carolina so he'd had to pay cash for the motel that weekend.
scene_description: outdoors, nighttime, deserted street, falling snow, streetlight

segment_text: On Monday, while learning that his unemployment benefits were being held up because he hadn't worked the requisite six months in North Carolina, his car had been towed.
scene_description: outdoors, nighttime, deserted street, falling snow, streetlight

segment_text: The police were sure it had been towed, they just couldn't seem to determine where.
scene_description: outdoors, nighttime, deserted street, falling snow, streetlight

segment_text: He'd gone a little crazy then, but the cops had declined to jail him.
scene_description: outdoors, nighttime, deserted street, falling snow, streetlight

segment_text: Times were hard all over, and besides, it was almost Christmas.
scene_description: outdoors, nighttime, deserted street, falling snow, streetlight

segment_text: Two more days had been enough to finish him.
scene_description: outdoors, nighttime, deserted street, falling snow, streetlight

segment_text: The three crumpled dollar bills in his pocket would not have gotten him through Christmas Day, even if this stranger had not arrived to deliver the final blow.
scene_description: outdoors, nighttime, deserted street, falling snow, streetlight

segment_text: "I know you're afraid of me," the man said.
scene_description: outdoors, nighttime, deserted street, falling snow, streetlight

segment_text: "It's nothing personal," Robinson told him.
scene_description: outdoors, nighttime, deserted street, falling snow, streetlight

segment_text: "Put yourself in my position."
scene_description: outdoors, nighttime, deserted street, falling snow, streetlight

segment_text: "Unless I'm much mistaken, I pretty much am in your position. Cold, hungry, and broke. Yes?"
scene_description: outdoors, nighttime, deserted street, falling snow, streetlight

segment_text: Robinson ventured another look at him.
scene_description: outdoors, nighttime, deserted street, falling snow, streetlight

segment_text: Snow crystals darted inside his collar and melted against the bare skin underneath.
scene_description: outdoors, nighttime, deserted street, falling snow, streetlight

segment_text: "How much money you got?"
scene_description: outdoors, nighttime, deserted street, falling snow, streetlight

segment_text: "Forget it," Robinson said.
scene_description: outdoors, nighttime, deserted street, falling snow, streetlight

segment_text: "You can't have it. It's all I've got left."
scene_description: outdoors, nighttime, deserted street, falling snow, streetlight

segment_text: "You can kill me if you want to."
scene_description: outdoors, nighttime, deserted street, falling snow, streetlight

segment_text: "I like it that you're brave," the man said, "but I'm not going to hurt you any.
scene_description: outdoors, nighttime, deserted street, falling snow, streetlight

segment_text: Just looking for a little company."
scene_description: outdoors, nighttime, deserted street, falling snow, streetlight

segment_text: "I'm not gay, if that's what you're thinking."
scene_description: outdoors, nighttime, deserted street, falling snow, streetlight

segment_text: "You should try not to worry so much. Everything's going to be all right."
scene_description: outdoors, nighttime, deserted street, falling snow, streetlight

segment_text: "All right? Are you nuts? I'm waiting around to find out if I'm going to starve or freeze to death first."
scene_description: outdoors, nighttime, deserted street, falling snow, streetlight

segment_text: "Why don't you go to the shelter?"
scene_description: outdoors, nighttime, deserted street, falling snow, streetlight

segment_text: "It's a long story. I got kicked out for something I didn't do."
scene_description: outdoors, nighttime, deserted street, falling snow, streetlight

segment_text: He pulled his hands out of his pants pockets and stuck them under his arms to try to warm them up.
scene_description: outdoors, nighttime, deserted street, falling snow, streetlight

segment_text: "It doesn't matter."
scene_description: outdoors, nighttime, deserted street, falling snow, streetlight

segment_text: "Well, you got that much right."
scene_description: outdoors, nighttime, deserted street, falling snow, streetlight

segment_text: They sat for a while in silence.
scene_description: outdoors, nighttime, deserted street, falling snow, streetlight

segment_text: After a few minutes Robinson started to relax a little.
scene_description: outdoors, nighttime, deserted street, falling snow, streetlight

segment_text: If the man truly meant him harm he would have done something by now.
scene_description: outdoors, nighttime, deserted street, falling snow, streetlight

segment_text: "Look, I'm sorry," Robinson said.
scene_description: outdoors, nighttime, deserted street, falling snow, streetlight

segment_text: "I shouldn't have jumped to conclusions."
scene_description: outdoors, nighttime, deserted street, falling snow, streetlight

segment_text: "It's okay."
scene_description: outdoors, nighttime, deserted street, falling snow, streetlight

segment_text: "How come you aren't in the shelter?"
scene_description: outdoors, nighttime, deserted street, falling snow, streetlight

segment_text: "Claustrophobia. I can't stand being penned up."
scene_description: outdoors, nighttime, deserted street, falling snow, streetlight

segment_text: "You see what I mean? It's the fear that does it to you."
scene_description: outdoors, nighttime, deserted street, falling snow, streetlight

segment_text: "That's easy to say, but it's being broke that's doing it to me."
scene_description: outdoors, nighttime, deserted street, falling snow, streetlight

segment_text: The man didn't answer, and when Robinson finally glanced over at him again he had a troubled expression, as if trying to decide whether to speak up or not.
scene_description: outdoors, nighttime, deserted street, falling snow, streetlight

segment_text: "What?" Robinson said.
scene_description: outdoors, nighttime, deserted street, falling snow, streetlight

segment_text: "Nothing, really, just...well, that money stuff, that's just what they want you to believe."
scene_description: outdoors, nighttime, deserted street, falling snow, streetlight

segment_text: "They?"
scene_description: outdoors, nighttime, deserted street, falling snow, streetlight

segment_text: The man nodded.
scene_description: outdoors, nighttime, deserted street, falling snow, streetlight

segment_text: "As long as you believe money can keep you safe, you stay in the game. Trying to move to a better neighborhood, buy a safer car, get more insurance."
scene_description: outdoors, nighttime, deserted street, falling snow, streetlight

segment_text: People like you and me, we're the ones that have a chance to get out."
scene_description: outdoors, nighttime, deserted street, falling snow, streetlight

segment_text: Somewhat reluctantly, Robinson asked, "Get out how?"
scene_description: outdoors, nighttime, deserted street, falling snow, streetlight

segment_text: "Well, I never really understood that part. I think you just kind of go to another place entirely."
scene_description: outdoors, nighttime, deserted street, falling snow, streetlight

segment_text: "What are you talking about?"
scene_description: outdoors, nighttime, deserted street, falling snow, streetlight

segment_text: "Once you stop being afraid. It changes everything."
scene_description: outdoors, nighttime, deserted street, falling snow, streetlight

segment_text: The man fixed Robinson with an intent stare.
scene_description: outdoors, nighttime, deserted street, falling snow, streetlight

segment_text: "Literally, you understand what I'm saying?"
scene_description: outdoors, nighttime, deserted street, falling snow, streetlight

segment_text: He'd had Robinson going for a minute, but now the wires were starting to show.
scene_description: outdoors, nighttime, deserted street, falling snow, streetlight

segment_text: "Don't tell me, let me guess. We have to start by giving away all our money."
scene_description: outdoors, nighttime, deserted street, falling snow, streetlight

segment_text: "Once you stop being afraid, you don't need money any more."
scene_description: outdoors, nighttime, deserted street, falling snow, streetlight

segment_text: "What do you eat?"
scene_description: outdoors, nighttime, deserted street, falling snow, streetlight

segment_text: "Okay, see, there was this guy who told me about it, the way I'm telling you. Just like you, I was trying to imagine what it would be like."
scene_description: outdoors, nighttime, deserted street, falling snow, streetlight

segment_text: And I fell asleep and I dreamed about it. It was nice and warm everywhere, and you could eat the buildings."
scene_description: outdoors, nighttime, deserted street, falling snow, streetlight

segment_text: "Eat the buildings."
scene_description: outdoors, nighttime, deserted street, falling snow, streetlight

segment_text: "The white stone tasted like Vietnamese sticky rice. The red bricks were like Devil's Food cake."
scene_description: outdoors, nighttime, deserted street, falling snow, streetlight

segment_text: The wind whistled and howled down the deserted city streets.
scene_description: outdoors, nighttime, deserted street, falling snow, streetlight

segment_text: It was so cold that the hard grains of snow weren't accumulating, but were flying in front of the wind, scouring the sidewalks.
scene_description: outdoors, nighttime, deserted street, falling snow, streetlight

segment_text: "So," Robinson said, "what happened to this guy?"
scene_description: outdoors, nighttime, deserted street, falling snow, streetlight

segment_text: "He disappeared."
scene_description: outdoors, nighttime, deserted street, falling snow, streetlight

segment_text: "While you were dreaming about eating buildings?"
scene_description: outdoors, nighttime, deserted street, falling snow, streetlight

segment_text: "Before that. He disappeared right in front of me, while I was looking at him."
scene_description: outdoors, nighttime, deserted street, falling snow, streetlight

segment_text: "I think he went to that other place."
scene_description: outdoors, nighttime, deserted street, falling snow, streetlight

segment_text: Robinson couldn't feel his feet any more, and he was starting to get sleepy in drugged sort of way.
scene_description: outdoors, nighttime, deserted street, falling snow, streetlight

segment_text: These seemed like bad signs.
scene_description: outdoors, nighttime, deserted street, falling snow, streetlight

segment_text: He stood up.
scene_description: outdoors, nighttime, deserted street, falling snow, streetlight

segment_text: "I got to move on."
scene_description: outdoors, nighttime, deserted street, falling snow, streetlight

segment_text: "Before you go," the man said, "why don't you give me that last three dollars in your pocket?"
scene_description: outdoors, nighttime, deserted street, falling snow, streetlight

segment_text: Robinson felt a chill that had nothing to do with the weather.
scene_description: outdoors, nighttime, deserted street, falling snow, streetlight

segment_text: "How did you know that?" he said.
scene_description: outdoors, nighttime, deserted street, falling snow, streetlight

segment_text: "I didn't tell you how much money I have."
scene_description: outdoors, nighttime, deserted street, falling snow, streetlight

segment_text: "Sure you did. You said, 'Let me guess, I'm supposed to give you my last three dollars.'"
scene_description: outdoors, nighttime, deserted street, falling snow, streetlight

segment_text: "No," Robinson said, hearing the tremor in his voice and not liking it, "I didn't. I didn't say that."
scene_description: outdoors, nighttime, deserted street, falling snow, streetlight

segment_text: The man shrugged.
scene_description: outdoors, nighttime, deserted street, falling snow, streetlight

segment_text: "Don't get all bent out of shape. Sit down, I'm not going to hurt you."
scene_description: outdoors, nighttime, deserted street, falling snow, streetlight

segment_text: "I want to tell you a story."
scene_description: outdoors, nighttime, deserted street, falling snow, streetlight

segment_text: Robinson was starting to panic.
scene_description: outdoors, nighttime, deserted street, falling snow, streetlight

segment_text: Yet the weirder the conversation got, the more afraid he was to walk off into the darkness.
scene_description: outdoors, nighttime, deserted street, falling snow, streetlight

segment_text: "I'll stand," he said.
scene_description: outdoors, nighttime, deserted street, falling snow, streetlight

segment_text: Sharp pains stabbed through his feet and he rocked forward onto his toes to keep the blood flowing.
scene_description: outdoors, nighttime, deserted street, falling snow, streetlight

segment_text: "This guy dies and goes to Heaven, see, and right away he's arguing with St. Peter.
scene_description: outdoors, nighttime, deserted street, falling snow, streetlight

segment_text: 'If I'm on the list,' he says, 'why was it so hard for me all my life? Why didn't you help me out?'
scene_description: outdoors, nighttime, deserted street, falling snow, streetlight

segment_text: Why didn't you, I don't know, let me win the lottery or something?'"
scene_description: outdoors, nighttime, deserted street, falling snow, streetlight

segment_text: And Peter looks through his book and he says, 'According to this, you never bought a ticket.'"
scene_description: outdoors, nighttime, deserted street, falling snow, streetlight

segment_text: Robinson waited for him to go on, and finally said, "That's it? That's the wisdom you have for me?"
scene_description: outdoors, nighttime, deserted street, falling snow, streetlight

segment_text: "I'm just offering you a chance to buy a ticket."
scene_description: outdoors, nighttime, deserted street, falling snow, streetlight

segment_text: At some point, without thinking about it, Robinson had shoved his hands back into his pockets.
scene_description: outdoors, nighttime, deserted street, falling snow, streetlight

segment_text: The three one-dollar bills, folded twice, were in the fingers of his right hand.
scene_description: outdoors, nighttime, deserted street, falling snow, streetlight

segment_text: What difference, he thought, did it make?
scene_description: outdoors, nighttime, deserted street, falling snow, streetlight

segment_text: He threw the wad of bills at the man.
scene_description: outdoors, nighttime, deserted street, falling snow, streetlight

segment_text: "Go ahead. Take it. I don't care any more."
scene_description: outdoors, nighttime, deserted street, falling snow, streetlight

segment_text: Then he turned his back and walked away.
scene_description: outdoors, nighttime, deserted street, falling snow, streetlight

segment_text: He didn't get three steps before the panic returned, and with it, shame.
scene_description: outdoors, nighttime, deserted street, falling snow, streetlight

segment_text: He'd let some nut case scam him out of his last three bucks. How stupid was that?
scene_description: outdoors, nighttime, deserted street, falling snow, streetlight

segment_text: And what was he going to do with no money at all?
scene_description: outdoors, nighttime, deserted street, falling snow, streetlight

segment_text: As long as he had three dollars, or two, or one, there was some hope.
scene_description: outdoors, nighttime, deserted street, falling snow, streetlight

segment_text: He still had his lottery ticket; he was still in the game.
scene_description: outdoors, nighttime, deserted street, falling snow, streetlight

segment_text: He turned back, saying, "Look, I'm sorry, but--"
scene_description: outdoors, nighttime, deserted street, falling snow, streetlight

segment_text: The man was gone.
scene_description: outdoors, nighttime, deserted street, falling snow, streetlight

segment_text: The three dollars lay against the arm of the bench, pinned there by the pressure of the wind.
scene_description: outdoors, nighttime, deserted street, falling snow, streetlight

segment_text: Robinson snatched them up, trying to calculate how long he'd had his back turned, where the man could have gone in that amount of time.
scene_description: outdoors, nighttime, deserted street, falling snow, streetlight

segment_text: It didn't matter.
scene_description: outdoors, nighttime, deserted street, falling snow, streetlight

segment_text: If Robinson stood there much longer he was going to freeze.
scene_description: outdoors, nighttime, deserted street, falling snow, streetlight

segment_text: He started back toward the shelter, head down, walking into the wind, the cold squeezing tears from his eyes.
scene_description: outdoors, nighttime, deserted street, falling snow, streetlight

segment_text: His feet were on fire.
scene_description: outdoors, nighttime, deserted street, falling snow, streetlight

segment_text: They would have to let him in. It would amount to murder if they didn't.
scene_description: outdoors, nighttime, deserted street, falling snow, streetlight

segment_text: But when he got to the entrance it was dark and silent, a metal grid locked across it.
scene_description: outdoors, nighttime, locked shelter entrance, metal grid, donation box, windy

segment_text: Robinson reached through the bars to pound on the door but the bitter wind blew the sound away.
scene_description: outdoors, nighttime, locked shelter entrance, metal grid, donation box, windy

segment_text: He put his hand back in his pocket and felt the crumpled bills there at the same time that his gaze fell on the donation box bolted to the door.
scene_description: outdoors, nighttime, locked shelter entrance, metal grid, donation box, windy

segment_text: Beyond reason, beyond thought, he stuffed the money into the box and shuffled away.
scene_description: outdoors, nighttime, locked shelter entrance, metal grid, donation box, windy

segment_text: The snow stopped.
scene_description: outdoors, nighttime, shelter exterior wall, warm air grating, streetlight, stone texture

segment_text: The air was suddenly warm, and there was light.
scene_description: outdoors, nighttime, shelter exterior wall, warm air grating, streetlight, stone texture

segment_text: Robinson blinked.
scene_description: outdoors, nighttime, shelter exterior wall, warm air grating, streetlight, stone texture

segment_text: The golden brown fieldstone of the building beside him looked like the crust on a loaf of French bread.
scene_description: outdoors, nighttime, shelter exterior wall, warm air grating, streetlight, stone texture

segment_text: Slowly Robinson reached out to break off a piece.
scene_description: outdoors, nighttime, shelter exterior wall, warm air grating, streetlight, stone texture

segment_text: His fingernails scraped against cold stone.
scene_description: outdoors, nighttime, shelter exterior wall, warm air grating, streetlight, stone texture

segment_text: He looked up and saw the streetlight, looked down and saw the grating that was blowing warm air from somewhere inside the building, with just enough force to push the snow away.
scene_description: outdoors, nighttime, shelter exterior wall, warm air grating, streetlight, stone texture

segment_text: Slowly Robinson sat on the grating and let the warmth seep into him.
scene_description: outdoors, nighttime, shelter exterior wall, warm air grating, streetlight, stone texture

segment_text: He was afraid, but he was less afraid than he had been.
scene_description: outdoors, nighttime, shelter exterior wall, warm air grating, streetlight, stone texture

segment_text: It was hard, he thought, not being afraid.
scene_description: outdoors, nighttime, shelter exterior wall, warm air grating, streetlight, stone texture

segment_text: But maybe, in time, he could learn.
scene_description: outdoors, nighttime, shelter exterior wall, warm air grating, streetlight, stone texture
